features: IMMUNE SUPPORT: 100 count, 500mg Vitamin C Tablets for immune support; (1) Vitamin C is one of the leading nutritional vitamins for immune support (1)
NOURISHES THE IMMUNE SYSTEM: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Tablets play an important role in the functioning of white blood cells; which are vital components of the immune system (1)

POTENT ANTIOXIDANT: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Tablets also support antioxidant health; (1) Vitamin C is one of the best antioxidants for fighting the free radicals; Free radicals can cause oxidative stress that may lead to premature aging of the cells

PURITY IS OUR PRIORITY: Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements; Our Vitamin C Tablets are non GMO; gluten and sugar free; and contain no artificial colors; or sweeteners

FROM THE TRUSTED WELLNESS EXPERTS: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C supplements are a product of 50 years of dedication to quality; consistency and scientific research to make vitamins and nutritional supplements of unrivaled excellence
body.description: Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C is one of our leading vitamins for immune support. (1) Vitamin C is an important nutrient for the functioning of white blood cells, which are vital components of the immune system. (1) Vitamin C Tablets from the trusted vitamin experts at Nature’s Bounty provide a sufficient dose of Vitamin C without the ingredients you may not want. They also are one of the best antioxidants for fighting free radicals. (1) Free radicals can cause oxidative stress that may lead to premature aging of the cells. Nature’s Bounty Vitamin C Tablets combine science, nature and 50 years of expertise and innovation to provide the easiest way to increase your daily intake of this important nutrient for immune support and antioxidant health. (1) Nature’s Bounty is committed to safety and purity in all our supplements. Our Vitamin C Tablets are non-GMO, gluten- and sugar-free, and contain no artificial colors, or sweeteners. For adults, simply take one tablet up to four times daily, preferably with meals. Each bottle of Nature's Bounty Vitamin C contains 100 tablets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Immune Support You Can Trust (1) For 50 years, Nature’s Bounty has blended the best of nature with the latest in science and nutritional innovation. Give your body the immune support it needs to help maintain overall health year round. (1) From essential vitamins like Vitamin C and zinc to herbal health formulas like elderberry gummies, our range of Immune Health products offer you only the purest, most trusted ingredients to help you maintain a healthy immune system. (1) From the #1 Brand for Zinc (3) comes Nature’s Bounty Zinc Caplets and Zinc Gummies. Zinc is a trace element that plays a vital role in immune support while also supporting antioxidant health. (1) Nature’s Bounty also offers an array of Vitamin C products, including Nature’s Bounty Immune 24 + with 1,000 mg of Ester-C, the only clinically studied Vitamin C that stays in your white blood cells up to 24 hours, for round the clock immune support. (1)

Driving Innovation Through Scientific Expertise Our Scientific Advisory Council is made up of some of the most respected scientists and researchers in the field who play a key role in the Company’s product innovation and scientific advancement. Quality You Can Count On At Nature's Bounty, we prioritize a high standard of quality control to deliver the great supplements available. Our rigorous process ensures that every product meets our criteria for excellence. We are committed to providing you with the best possible experience and results for your health and wellness. Don’t Just Take Our Word for It We’re proud that our products are manufactured in state-of-the-art facilities that meet FDA’s regulations. We pride ourselves on using high quality ingredients, leaving no room for compromise. Trust that when you choose our products, you are choosing safety and efficacy above all else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it help
reviews.reviewText: This brand of vit-C seems to work quite well at a fair price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to swallow. Just what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the immune system
reviews.reviewText: Vitamin C is critical for immune health. I had taken it for years, then a couple of years ago, I had to cut down on the pills I took every day. I made the mistake of eliminating Vitamin C as part of that downsizing. In the time I wasn't taking Vitamin C, I had numerous urinary tract infections and even had sepsis twice. I've learned my lesson and won't give up this vitamin again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slightly harder to swallow but great value, will buy again
reviews.reviewText: Pro:- Great value- Works great, does the jobCon:- Tablets are small but slightly harder to swallow (it helps when you drink water first and then you put the pills)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take Your Vitamins
reviews.reviewText: One thing I'll be doing more of in 2024 is taking the supplements I have. Included is this one. I like the brand, but mostly appreciate the availability online. Not always the case in the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: El sabor es agrio, para mi es perfecta ya que la endulsadas no funcionan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone needs some amount of C vitamin.
reviews.reviewText: Without any flavoring the taste of the vitamin is barely okay to swallow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought it again
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a 250-tablet bottle last year but couldn't finish it. This year, I found a smaller version and will just buy it in the future to avoid waste.
